column6:
The Hood makes his play for the big time by gathering the most ruthless rogues gallery of evil the Marvel Universe has ever seen. What does a guy who wants to be the "Kingpin of all super-villains" do to make his point? You have to see it to believe it.,2007,10
Guest-Starring Tigra. Poor Tigra. Poor, poor Tigra.
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Comicraft | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | colorist:Dave McCaig | penciller (cover):Leinil Francis Yu
